channel.title: Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Session 1: Vectors
item.description: Lecture notes on the geometric and algebraic view of vectors, notation and terminology, vector algebra using coordinates, vectors in three dimensions, and unit vectors.
